message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $20,000, which reflects the true worth of its capabilities.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not sure I can go that high. I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product, which I think is a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a deal, but $12,000 is significantly below its value. I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your flexibility, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $14,000. This is a serious offer, and I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
